mapper.sql: FROM NOTICE_TB nt INNER JOIN TRANSLATION_TB tt ON nt.notice_title_t_no = tt.trans_no
mapper.select:
/* selectNoticeList */ SELECT nt.notice_no noticeNo, tt.trans_en noticeTitleEn, nt.notice_reg_dt noticeRegDate
ORDER by notice_reg_dt DESC LIMIT ${startIndex}, 10

/* selectNoticeDetail */ SELECT notice_no noticeNo , notice_title_t_no noticeTitleTransNo , (SELECT tt.trans_en FROM TRANSLATION_TB tt WHERE tt.trans_no = nt.notice_title_t_no) noticeTitleEn , (SELECT tt.trans_t_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB tt WHERE tt.trans_no = nt.notice_title_t_no) noticeTitleTc , (SELECT tt.trans_s_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB tt WHERE tt.trans_no = nt.notice_title_t_no) noticeTitleSc , notice_detail_t_no noticeContentTransNo , (SELECT tt.trans_en FROM TRANSLATION_TB tt WHERE tt.trans_no = nt.notice_detail_t_no) noticeContentEn , (SELECT tt.trans_t_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB tt WHERE tt.trans_no = nt.notice_detail_t_no) noticeContentTc , (SELECT tt.trans_s_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB tt WHERE tt.trans_no = nt.notice_detail_t_no) noticeContentSc , notice_img_url_t_no noticeImgUrlTransNo , (SELECT tt.trans_en FROM TRANSLATION_TB tt WHERE tt.trans_no = nt.notice_img_url_t_no) noticeImgUrlEn , (SELECT tt.trans_t_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB tt WHERE tt.trans_no = nt.notice_img_url_t_no) noticeImgUrlTc , (SELECT tt.trans_s_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB tt WHERE tt.trans_no = nt.notice_img_url_t_no) noticeImgUrlSc , notice_is_main noticeIsMain , notice_reg_dt noticeRegDate FROM NOTICE_TB nt WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.delete: /* deleteNotice */ DELETE FROM NOTICE_TB WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
